name: stay a rave
description:
You play a raver in a techno Club. The goal is to stay awake until the club closes. To do that, you have to consume certain substances, which influence the following values:

  • attention
  • fatigue
  • overdose level

How to lose:

  • get caught by cops when the attention or overdose level is too high
  • if you dont consume substances your fatigue level will be too high

What to do:

  • run around
  • rave
  • consume different substances

Controls:

  • Mouse -> Camera
  • W-A-S-D -> Move
  • R -> Rave

Control influences:

  • the player controls and sences will be influenced by your overdose and fatigue level

Assets are either from mixamo.com, generated by several different AIs or created by ourselfes.

CLICK! for some sick sounds!
